Detect_Package_Manager.name: Detect_Package_Manager
Detect_Package_Manager.description: Auto-detects the correct Python package installer (pip3, pip, or python3 -m pip)
Detect_Package_Manager.code:
import shutil
manager = 'pip3' if shutil.which('pip3') else ('pip' if shutil.which('pip') else 'python3 -m pip')
